name: part_000
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】First Starring Role【轟はじめ⧸ReGLOSS】 #轟はじめ生誕祭2025 [bjPYXtxhm0I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: A static opening graphic transitions to a dark arena with spotlights as the audience waits for the 3D Live to begin.
A pre-performance announcement (kageana) by Todoroki Hajime, welcoming the audience and giving instructions.
The announcement repeats for a second time with slight variations and extra casual remarks.
The arena screen shows the 'ReGLOSS' and 'hololive DEV_IS' logos rotating while instrumental music plays.

subtitles.original: えー、皆様、本日は轟はじめ生誕祭2025にお越しくださいまして、誠にありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Umm, everyone, thank you very much for coming to the Todoroki Hajime Birthday Festival 2025 today.

subtitles.original: 開演に先立ちまして、皆様にお願いとご案内を申し上げます。
subtitles.english: Prior to the start of the performance, I would like to make some requests and announcements.

subtitles.original: 当配信は一部収録を含みますが、生配信部分もございますので、いっぱいコメントして盛り上げてください。
subtitles.english: This stream includes some pre-recorded segments, but there are also live broadcast parts, so please comment a lot and get excited.

subtitles.original: マニマニも見えてるんでしゅけど... うんちょ、うんちょ、番長！
subtitles.english: I can see the 'Manimani' as well... Uncho, uncho, Bancho!

subtitles.original: きゃー！きちゃー！おー、きちゃー！
subtitles.english: Kyaa! It's here! Oh, it's here!

subtitles.original: おー、やべえ。こんちくわー。ありがとうございましゅ。
subtitles.english: Oh, man. Konchikuwa! Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: テレビやパソコン、スマートフォンの前での飲食は可能ですが、キーボードにこぼさないようにお気をつけください。
subtitles.english: Eating and drinking in front of your TV, PC, or smartphone is allowed, but please be careful not to spill on your keyboard.

subtitles.original: 当配信のハッシュタグは「轟はじめ生誕祭2025」でしゅ。
subtitles.english: The hashtag for this stream is #TodorokiHajimeBirthdayFestival2025.

subtitles.original: SNSでたくさんポストしてくだちゃい。
subtitles.english: Please post a lot on social media.

subtitles.original: 開演中、パソコンやスマートフォンなどによる写真撮影、大歓迎でしゅ。
subtitles.english: Taking photos with your PC or smartphone during the performance is very welcome.

subtitles.original: たくさんポストして盛り上げてくれると、うれちいしゅ。
subtitles.english: I'd be happy if you post a lot and help liven things up.

subtitles.original: それでは、開演までしばらくお待ちくだちゃい。
subtitles.english: Now, please wait a little longer until the performance begins.

subtitles.original: えー、皆様、本日は轟はじめ生誕祭2025にお越しくださいまして、誠にありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Umm, everyone, thank you very much for coming to the Todoroki Hajime Birthday Festival 2025 today.

subtitles.original: 開演に先立ちまして、皆様にお願いとご案内を申し上げます。
subtitles.english: Prior to the start of the performance, I would like to make some requests and announcements.

subtitles.original: えー、当配信は一部収録を含みますが、生配信部分もございますので、いっぱいコメントして盛り上げてくれると、すごくうれちいしゅ。
subtitles.english: Umm, this stream includes some pre-recorded segments, but there are also live broadcast parts, so I'd be very happy if you comment a lot and get excited.

subtitles.original: じょわ、じょわ。2周目助かる。ワクワク。2回目。いいだろう、2回言っても。ありがとね。
subtitles.english: Jowa, jowa. Second lap helps! How exciting. A second time. It's fine to say it twice, right? Thanks.

subtitles.original: えー、テレビやパソコン、スマートフォンの前での飲食は可能ですが、キーボードにこぼさないようにお気をつけください。
subtitles.english: Umm, eating and drinking in front of your TV, PC, or smartphone is allowed, but please be careful not to spill on your keyboard.

subtitles.original: 当配信のハッシュタグは「轟はじめ生誕祭2025」でしゅ。
subtitles.english: The hashtag for this stream is #TodorokiHajimeBirthdayFestival2025.

subtitles.original: SNSでたくさんポストしてくだちゃい。
subtitles.english: Please post a lot on social media.

subtitles.original: 開演中、パソコンやスマートフォンなどによる写真撮影も、あの、大歓迎なので、いっぱいいっぱいいっぱい、いっぱいポストしてくだちゃい。
subtitles.english: During the performance, photography by PC or smartphone is also, uh, very welcome, so please post many, many, many, many times.

subtitles.original: それでは、開演までしばらく、もうちょっと、お待ちくだちゃい。
subtitles.english: Now, please wait a little longer, just a bit more, until the performance begins.
